Cluckes' Adventure

The chicks have been captured by the evil minions! Help Cluckles in her adventure to rescue them all!

Cluckles may be small, but she is a feisty and brave little chicken, she won't let the minions stand in her way! Armed with her trusty sword Cluckles must run, jump and dash through 100+ tricky levels, but watch out: the worlds are full of spikes, traps and deadly enemies. Find the chicks hiding in each level and reach the exit. Discover secret areas where chicks and useful power-ups could be hiding. Collect shields and armor to help Cluckles on her quest. Explore three different environments. Defeat the minions and rescue the stolen chicks!

Game Features
  • A highly replayable and fun action / puzzle platform game!
  • Find the chicks hiding in each level to be awarded a perfect star. Unlock achievements!
  • Featuring 108 challenging levels, full of secrets, puzzles, tricky obstacles and enemies. Hours of entertainment!
  • Cute pixel art graphics!
  • Amazing, catchy retro soundtrack by NMBoom.
